hey nightwish. i know you were born in 1988 but please the subs are chinese. It's never to late to learn a little about the great outside. it would be like taking german subs for english one. and oh boy you wouldn't like it. and by the way, i'm french and i speak your language.

hey, deus3x, pas tous les AmĂŠricains sont stupides!  Some of us went to college or even learned other languages in high school.  We have very little use for Chinese in our everyday lives - just as even though I took four years of French, I've never really had occasion to use it.  On the other hand, English is spoken in most countries worldwide; and I'm sure that's why you speak it.  Chinese and Japanese schools teach English to all their students for a reason.  
p.s I see people butchering English on this site and others every day and don't call them stupid.  Chill out on the hatin, bro, you'll end up with a stroke.
